summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3661 , for the improvement of the alley in block 3, McGraw's Washington Park Addition, being the alley in the block bounded on the north by East Ward Street; on the west by Washington Boulevard and on the south by East Madison Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45088, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
